item.title: Report X-2024010136
item.description:
Report X-2024010136

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-11T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-29
  • City: ROMULUS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AN AIR FIVE GALLON PAIL WAS INSPECTED DUE TO TRIGGER TERM WRITTEN ON THE TOP OF THE PAIL. THE PAIL INDICATED A WASTE WAS BEING SHIPPED. UPON FURTHER INSPECTION OF THE PAIL AN SDS WAS ATTACHED SHOWING THE CONTENTS TO BE REGULATED IN AIR TRANSPORTATION AS CALCIUM OXIDE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PAIL TO INDICATE A REGULATED DANGEROUS GOODS WAS BEING SHIPPED.

item.title: Report X-2024010053
item.description:
Report X-2024010053

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-10T15:11:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-22
  • City: CASS CITY
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND UNLOADING INSIDE THE TRAILER. A SIDE OF THE BOX WAS WET. DURING INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED ONE BOTTLE INSIDE THE BOX WITH CAP/LID/TOP CRUSHED CAUSING THE BOTTLE TO LEAK. THE BOTTLES WERE INSIDE THE BOX IN INDIVIDUAL PLASTIC BAGS WITH AIR BAGS AROUND THEM. RESPONDER PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.
